  1. …in reply to @zachleat
    Let’s just throw this one away, folks—it was too ambiguous. I meant to say “Do you add other people’s personal web sites to your home screen?” but enough people are reading it as “Do you add your own web site to your home screen?” to make the results too muddied to have value.
